mapper.select: SELECT R.*, M1.email AS reportermemberemail, M2.email AS reportedmemberemail FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS M1 ON R.memberno = M1.no LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS M2 ON R.reportedmemberno = M2.no ORDER BY no LIMIT #{startIdx}, 10
SELECT R.*, M1.email AS reportermemberemail, M2.email AS reportedmemberemail FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M1 ON R.memberno = M1.no JOIN MEMBER M2 ON R.reportedmemberno = M2.no WHERE R.no = #{no}
SELECT R.date, R.content FROM REPORT R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.reportedmemberno = M.no WHERE M.email = #{email}
